House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00869
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING CERTAIN SECTIONS OF RA 10068 OR THE ORGANIC AGRICULTURE ACT OF 2010
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ESTRELLA, CONRADO III M.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Nieto (000 2019-11-12)2. Dy (F.) (000 2019-11-12)
3. Singson-Meehan (000 2019-11-14)4. Dalipe (000 2019-11-14)
5. Savellano (000 2019-11-27)6. Tejada (000 2020-02-05)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-11-05
          -The Committee created a technical working group (TWG), to be chaired by Rep. Sharon S. Garin, to further study the measures.
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2019-12-11
          -The Chair, Rep. Sharon S. Garin, directed all resource persons to submit their agency's official position to the Committee for the drafting of the substitute bill to be presented to the Mother Committee.
MOTHER BILL: HB06878
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-07-23
